title: Fully Remodeled 2bd/1ba w/SS Appl + W/D in unit (223-4)
posting_body: Start your lease today and get 4 weeks free upon signing a one-year lease.
The actual rent is $2,750 but receiving 4 weeks free will bring your net-effective rent to ONLY $2,538.46 over the course of 12 months.
Welcome to 215-225 Lucas Ave, new high end apartment adjacent to L.A.'s iconic Echo Park neighborhood.
Featuring serene two and three bedroom apartments surrounded by beautiful new gardens and picturesque landscapes.
Inside the newly remodeled residences, revel in bright and airy living room/kitchen space with beautiful open floor plans and woods flooring throughout.
Be the first to enjoy all new stainless steel appliances in newly remodeled kitchens with jet black quartz and matte black finishes.
All units are fully equipped with washer and dryer, all new appliances, and mini split air conditioner.
***Disclaimer - pictures may not be of the exact vacant unit but represents the style and fixtures of the exact unit.
- hot water, cold water and gas.
Please call our office to schedule a showing!
